meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> is coming for the <radical>cliff</radical> made of <radical>tofu</radical>, but there is a special <kanji>sect</kanji> that protects tofu cliff.
readingMnemonic: All of the members of the <kanji>sect</kanji> are standing on the cliff, their hands raised, and right as the tsunami is about to collide with them, they shout, "<reading>Ha</reading> (は)!" and it's repelled! The tsunami sinks and rolls back out to sea, the tofu cliff is safe!
